headline: Wizz Air in deal with  Pratt & Whitney to address engine issues, sees recovery
summary: Wizz Air Holdings (WZZZY) has entered a new agreement with Pratt & Whitney, an RTX Corporation (RTX) unit, to address ongoing engine issues with PW1100G-JM geared turbofan engines. The airline projects around 40 Airbus A320NEO family planes will remain grounded through fiscal 2026 due to required engine inspections. Wizz Air is working with Pratt & Whitney to minimize financial and operational impacts and expedite the return of grounded aircraft. The deal includes operational support and compens

headline: Q3 Earnings Roundup: Leonardo DRS (NASDAQ:DRS) And The Rest Of The Defense Contractors Segment
summary: As the Q3 earnings season comes to a close, it’s time to take stock of this quarter’s best and worst performers in the defense contractors industry, including Leonardo DRS (NASDAQ:DRS) and its peers.
